data.title: BONDI JIU JITSU ACADEMY
data.meta_description: Bondi Jiu Jitsu Academy - World Class BJJ in the heart of Bondi Beach
data.text:
JIU JITSU FOR YOU

WE ARE DEDICATED TO YOUR PROGRESSION

Teaching confidence through martial arts for the whole family! All ages and all levels welcome!

Welcome to Bondi Jiu Jitsu Academy (BJJA) located in the heart of Bondi Beach. World Class Brazilian Jiu Jitsu serving our community for all levels from beginner, hobbyist, to professional competitor.

***NO LOCK-IN CONTRACTS*** At Bondi Jiu Jitsu we understand circumstances change. We won’t lock you into any contracts.

For new students… Sparring (known as ‘rolling’) is supervised and partnered with more experienced students for your optimum progression.

All ages and experience levels are welcome. Come and visit our brand new air-conditioned academy at 115-119 Bondi Road.

Feel welcome to enjoy a trial class, our experienced instructors are ready to guide you through the beginning of your Brazilian Jiu Jitsu journey. Your best Jiu Jitsu experience starts here!

Book your free trial now.
